title: Interface to TexTra from R
text: goal textrar translate texts TexTra easily. https://mt-auto-minhon-mlt.ucri.jgn-x.jp/

title: Interface to TexTra from R
text: can install GitHub : can also install CRAN:

title: Interface to TexTra from R
text: can use textra() translate texts textra easily.
code: library(textrar)  key <- "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw01234567890abcdef1" # API key secret <- "xyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw012345"       # API secret name <- "login_ID"                                 # login_ID params <- gen_params(key = key, secret = secret, name = name)  text <- "Hello world" translated <- textra(text, params, model = "transLM", from = "en", to = "it") translated  ## [1] "Ciao mondo"

title: Interface to TexTra from R
text: Toshikazu Matsumura (2024) textrar. Interface TexTra R. https://github.com/matutosi/textrar/

what: Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
title: Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
text: function extracts translated text response. returned post_request() function.

title: Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
text: res response object returned post_request().

title: Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
text: character string containing translated text.

title: Extract Translated Text from Response — extract_result
code: if (FALSE) { res <- post_request(paramas, "Hello world!") translated <- extract_result(res) }

what: Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
title: Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
text: function generates list parameters can used make API call.

title: Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
text: key API key. secret API secret. name name API. api_name name API use. Defaults "mt".

title: Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
text: list parameters.

title: Generate parameters for API call — gen_params
code: if (FALSE) { key <- "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw01234567890abcdef1" # API key secret <- "xyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw012345"       # API secret name <- "login_ID"                                 # login_ID params <- gen_params(key = key, secret = secret, name = name) }

title: Get Access Token — get_token
text: function retrieves access token API using provided key secret.

title: Get Access Token — get_token
Get Access Token — get_token
text: key API key. secret API secret.

title: Get Access Token — get_token
text: character string containing access token.

title: Get Access Token — get_token
code: if (FALSE) { key <- "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw01234567890abcdef1" # API key secret <- "xyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw012345"       # API secret token <- get_token(key = key, secret = secret) }

what: Send a POST request to the API — post_request
title: Send a POST request to the API — post_request
text: function sends POST request API specified parameters text.

title: Send a POST request to the API — post_request
Send a POST request to the API — post_request
text: params list parameters passed API. text text translated.

title: Send a POST request to the API — post_request
text: response API.

what: Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
title: Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
text: function translates text using transliteration model.

title: Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
text: text text translated. params list parameters passed API. model model used translation. source language. target language.

title: Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
text: translated text.

title: Translate text using Transliteration Model — textra
code: if (FALSE) { text <- "Hello world" key <- "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw01234567890abcdef1" # API key secret <- "xyzabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvw012345"       # API secret name <- "login_ID"                                 # login_ID params <- gen_params(key = key, secret = secret, name = name) translated <-    textra(text, params, model = "transLM", from = "en", to = "ja") translated }

title: textrar 0.8.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-23 First release textra() : main function translate TexTra gen_params(): function get token parameters
